id: This Girl Bringing Her Mom To Sesame Street Deserves To Be Daughter Of The Year
paragraph:
"ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ. It's the most remarkable word I've ever seen." -Big Bird
        I didn’t tell her what we were doing/where we were going until we were in the elevator.BUT THEN... we walked into the studios and I honestly thought my mom might pass out from excitement.Everyone was so kind and she even got to sit in Big Bird’s nest!There were lots of tears and very few words. My mom was TOTALLY speechless....AND KEPT COMINGBut the moment I think my mom loved the most was when Rosita hugged her and told her how much Sesame Street loves teachers. https://t.co/ZGrZDu01RABuzzFeed HomeSitemap© 2018 BuzzFeed, Inc.
